project_descr: Project strengthens policy and institutional frameworks for DRR. Project enhances existing capacities to build a reliable and efficient preparedness and response system and will build resilience of local communities.

outputs.output_descr: Project will strengthen policy and institutional frameworks for DRR. Project will enhance existing capacities to build a reliable and efficient preparedness and response system and will build resilience of local communities.

Early recovery and flood risk mitigation support to local communities in BIH by assisting the restoration of public sanitation services in 10 most affected localities and supporting technical flood defence measures
